item.title: Latex cheat sheets
item.description: Giới thiệu về Latex Link to heading in this tutorial, you will learn some of the basics on how to use $\latex$ to display equations in jupyter notebooks. for looking up symbols you may need, you can use any of the many cheat sheets you can find by asking google. i have provided a few that will come up often in this course at the end of this lesson.
